news.title: Under Trump, Uncle Sam is becoming an active investor at a scale not seen outside war or major crises
news.summary: The Trump administration has shown that it's willing to buy up stakes in publicly traded companies. Some say it's a level of intervention that some say is unprecedented.

news.title: China releases AI action plan days after the U.S. as global tech race heats up
news.summary: China calls for international cooperation on tech development and regulation. China on Saturday released a global action plan for artificial intelligence. The plan calls for cooperation on technology development, regulation.

news.title: CBS canceling Colbert begs the question: Are more late night shows next?
news.summary: The cost of producing late night programs has risen as the media industry has been upended by streaming and shifting consumer habits. The cost of produce late night shows has risen in the past few years.

news.title: Meta names OpenAI's Shengjia Zhao as chief scientist of AI Superintelligence Lab
news.summary: Shengjia Zhao will work directly with Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the former CEO of Scale AI and now Meta's chief AI officer.

news.title: Tesla needs a blockbuster EV to break a sales slump. Can a stripped-down Model Y do the job?
news.summary: A pared-down Model Y might do little to lift Tesla sales. To really get people excited about the brand again, Tesla needs “actual new vehicle models,” one analyst said.

news.title: ‘I’m considering giving up my U.S. citizenship’: I’m 39 and moving to the U.K. How should I invest my $30K savings?
news.summary: “My credit cards are paid off monthly, but I finally paid off my student loans earlier this year,” she said. “My student loans are paid for by my credit cards.”

news.title: Trump’s push for cane sugar in Coca-Cola puts spotlight on a sensitive market for sweeteners
news.summary: Coca-Cola is far from fully replacing high-fructose corn syrup with cane sugar. President Donald Trump’s push to change the sweetener used in Coke has thrown a spotlight on a commodity market.

news.title: ‘His income is limited’: Should I pay $800 a month towards my husband’s $67,000 student debt?
news.summary: “I have stopped short of paying for his business, his car payment and health insurance,” he said. “I’ve stopped short. of paying his business.”

news.title: ‘I have no debts’: Is this a good time to invest in the S&P 500? I’m 66, retired and have $700K.
